body:
## What's Changed
* fixes query consistency level match for execute message (issue #115) by @zdenotubel in https://github.com/datastax/simulacron/pull/116
* #118 Specify charset to utf-8 in script tag by @lawrenceching in https://github.com/datastax/simulacron/pull/119
* Adds decoded values to QueryLog (issue #64) by @zdenotubel in https://github.com/datastax/simulacron/pull/117
* fixed three CVEs in dependency jackson-databind by @weideng1 in https://github.com/datastax/simulacron/pull/123

## New Contributors
* @zdenotubel made their first contribution in https://github.com/datastax/simulacron/pull/116
* @lawrenceching made their first contribution in https://github.com/datastax/simulacron/pull/119
* @weideng1 made their first contribution in https://github.com/datastax/simulacron/pull/123

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/datastax/simulacron/compare/0.11.0...0.12.0

Changelog:

* [#96] Null pointer exceptions with prepared statements on protocol v5

Changelog:
- [#90] Support pausing reads on the channel

Changelog:

* [#86] PeerMetadataHandler should handle query variants

Small patch release addressing the following issues:

* [#82] Update PeerMetadataHandler to support new cluster name query
* [#84] Remove github-release-plugin

Small patch release which addresses the following:

* [#74] Parameters in logs may contain information from other queries
* [#75] Fix formatting in documentation 
* [#76] Move logback.xml from native-server to standalone
* [#79] Upgrade to native-protocol 1.4.4

Thank you to @jorgebay and @adutra for reporting issues and @ellisjoe for their contribution!

Small patch release which addresses the following:

* [#71] Default starting IP should be 127.0.0.1
* [#72] Assign unique host_ids to bound nodes

* [#68] Add response coalescer
* [#69] Remove recursive ConcurrentMap updates in CqlMapper
* [#65] system_virtual_tables support
* [#61] If isIgnoreOnPrepare create Action instead of delegating

This release addresses the following:

* [#59] - Update native-protocol dependency to 1.4.3
* [#53] - Allow nodes to share ip address, use different port (system.peers_v2 support)

This release addresses the following:

* [#50] - Update jackson-databind dependency to 2.9.5
* [#54] - OSGi support

This release addresses the following:

* [#39] - Unavailable result should not require message attribute
* [#40] - Make table optional for 'already_exists' result
* [#41] - Return protocol error when less than protocol v3 is used
* [#42] - Add messages to query log even if they use the wrong protocol version

Small release that addresses the following issue:

* [#37] - Include some result metadata in noRows response

Minor release bump due to:

* [#6] - Include frame in /log JSON

This change adds a new `frame` element to the `/log` json output, which includes the full native protocol frame.  With this change, `type`, `query`, `consistency_level`, `serial_consistency_level` and `client_timestamp` are marked as deprecated and will be removed in the next release, 0.9.0 as part of #36.

* [#10] - Allow configuring protocol version for CLuster, DC, Node
* [#22] - Protocol V5 support
* [#33] - Update to jackson-databind 2.9.3

Minor release bump due to incompatible change for:

* [#31] - Differentiate between the `then` affecting the prepared statement and the bound statement

`ErrorResult.isignoreOnPrepare` has been renamed and moved to `Result.isIgnoreOnPrepare`.  `ignore_on_prepare` in json now applies to all `then` results and defaults to `true`.

Setting `ignore_on_prepare` to false on a successful result enables `delay_in_ms` to apply to a `PREPARE` statement sent from a client, this fixes:

* [#23] - Timeout not working for priming prepare statement

Minor release bump due to incompatible change for:

* [#28] - Add client timestamp to query log

`timestamp` is now `received_timestamp` in JSON payload responses and `getReceivedTimestamp()` in API.

Also includes the following:

* [#29] - Upgrade jackson databind to 2.9.x

Small release that addresses the following:

* [#25] - Include host_id in system.local metadata

Small release that addresses the following:

* #17 - Use ConcurrentLinkedQueue for ActivityLog.queryLog
* #20 - Upgrade to native-protocol 1.4.1

Small release that addresses the following:

* #16 - Add log entry for prepare statement

Small release that addresses the following:

* #8 - Skip errors on prepare

Small release that addresses the following:

* #5 - Include inbound Frame in QueryLog

Please note that this change now logs *all* messages sent from a client to query logs, this includes messages like `STARTUP`, `REGISTER` and so on.

Small release that addresses the following:

* d7146bc5019ccd95e5cd728543372fc10c28a69f - Default success for unprimed batch statements
First release!
